ej,diazb001,P,schid901,Call at HP (Threw ball) $Bo Diaz argued the call at HP on Hal McRae and was ejected by HP umpire Don Schirmer; Diaz threw the ball into KC dugout allowing Clint Hurdle to score

$Lance Parrish returned safely to 1B after Andre Thornton dropped the ball in a rundown

1:43 by rain delay before start of game

$Brian Downing's liner hit Rick Wise just above the left knee
$Duane Kuiper bruised his left hip sliding
